page.title: 11EDUCATION - INVERNESS(WEST)
page.content: PUPILS IN THE COMPULSORY YEARS OF EDUCATION, BETWEEN 5 AND 16, ARE WELL SERVED IN THIS AREA, WITH 4 PRIMARY SCHOOLS AND TWO SECONDARY SCHOOLS. PUPILS AGED BETWEEN 5 AND 11 USUALLY ATTEND THE PRIMARY SCHOOL NEAREST THEIR HOME,WHILE THE SECONDARY DRAWS ITS PUPILS(11-16YEARS) FROM THE 'FEEDER' PRIMARIES AROUND IT AND FROM COUNTRY SCHOOLS OUTSIDE INVERNESS. -------------------------------------- SCHOOL BUILT PUPILS STAFF PUPILS -------------------------------------- KINMYLIES '77 357 16 46(P7) MUIRTOWN '75 300 12 34 " DALNEIGH '57 192 9 20 " MERKINCH 1876 320 13 52 " -------------------------------------- CHARLESTON '78 731 57 {10 HIGH SCHOOL '37 750 55 {5 ----------------------------------- THE HIGHLIGHTED COLUMN MEANS{FEEDER---
